subject: Football
Ratings (Audience Measurement)
Television
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: New England’s 28-24 victory Sunday attracted a record 114.4 million viewers, more than the average of 112.2 million who tuned in live to Seattle’s 43-8 rout of Denver last year.
snippet: New England’s 28-24 victory Sunday attracted a record 114.4 million viewers, more than the average of 112.2 million who tuned in live to Seattle’s 43-8 rout of Denver last year.
